definition: hand/(formal) to hold/person engaged in certain types of work/person skilled in certain types of work/personal(ly)/convenient/classifier for skill/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]
chain/cable (unit of length: 100 fathoms, about 185 m)/chain (unit of length: 66 feet, about 20 m)/to chain/to enchain

sentences.english: Where does turban sell stone needle hand chain?
G36PL100 - Possession bracelet, 18 carat yellow gold, set with diamonds.
sentences.chinese: 占有手链，18克拉黄金，钻石与一列集。

sentences.english: The metallic bracelet is silver-coloured and has a metallic charm in the shape of a peace sign.
sentences.chinese: 金属手链是银白色的，有和平标识形状的坠饰。

sentences.english: From prayer beads, key rings, necklaces , hand chains to pendants, providing with numerous varieties.
sentences.chinese: 从念珠到钥匙扣，项链，手链，挂件，种类很多。

sentences.english: I am looking for chan luu style wrap bracelets.
sentences.chinese: 我在寻找带珠的陈琉风格的皮革包裹手链。

sentences.english: I have a lucky charm bracelet, which is my great-grandfather's watch chain.
sentences.chinese: 我有一个幸运手链，那是我曾祖父的表链。

sentences.english: Is a super-price bracelet from start to finish.
sentences.chinese: 是一款善始善终的超价手链。

sentences.english: The dainty rhodium-plated bracelet features four stars.
sentences.chinese: 这款精巧细致的手链缀以四颗星星。

sentences.english: Of boreal Europe vogue, the astral hand catenary of fashionable gem.
sentences.chinese: 北欧时尚之都，时尚珠宝之星手链。

sentences.english: My grandmother gave me a 24K gold bracelet for my birthday.
sentences.chinese: 祖母在我生日时送了一条纯黄金手链。

sentences.english: They are glamourous , beautiful stones to have wrapped around ones wrist in a bracelet.
sentences.chinese: 他们是富有魅力的，美丽的宝石有缠在手腕上的手链。

sentences.english: The products include earrings, necklaces, bracelets , scarf clip and brooches.
sentences.chinese: 产品包括耳环，颈錬，手链和心口针等。

sentences.english: Pinky rings have met their match in wristbands.
sentences.chinese: 如今，小指戒指有了手链与之搭配。

sentences.english: Freshwater pearl and rhinestone strand interwoven with thread.
sentences.chinese: 淡水珍珠和水钻由股线编织成的手链。

sentences.english: Elegant and sophisticated, this ruthenium-plated bracelet sparkles in an amazing gradation of black and white.
sentences.chinese: 精致高雅，镀黑铬色手链闪烁着黑色和白色的渐变。

sentences.english: She wears a hand chain made of cryolite around her wrist.
sentences.chinese: 她手腕上戴着一串水晶石的手链。

definition: weight/pendant/same as 墜胡|坠胡[zhui4 hu2]/ballad singing accompanied by a 墜胡|坠胡[zhui4 hu2]
